short_summary: Purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Edmonton, Alberta
description: Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)", ".". This notice is issued pursuant to PWGSC Supply Arrangement (SA) # E60PQ-140003/C and covers a requirement from the following Product Category of the SA:", ".". Purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture to Edmonton, Alberta by March 31, 2024.
full_summary:
=================================
## Government Tender Announcement
================================stanov

### Mandatory Tender Notice
-----------------------------

#### English Summary
Furniture - Environment and Climate Change Canada is inviting tenders for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Edmonton, Alberta by March 31, 2024.

#### French Summary
Mobilier - Environnement et Changement climatique Canada lance un appel d'offres pour l'achat et la livraison de meubles d'office à Edmonton, Alberta avant le 31 mars 2024.

### Tender Details
-----------------

* **Tender Reference**: cb-629-59693924
* **Solicitation Number**: 5000077126
* **Publication Date**: December 15, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 5, 2024 at 15:00:00

### Category and Procurement Method
----------------------------------

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering

### Price Evaluation Criteria
---------------------------

* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

### Locations
--------------

* **Regions of Opportunity**: Unified
* **Regions of Delivery**: Alberta

### Contract and Agreement Information
--------------------------------------

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Environment and Climate Change Canada
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 351 boul. Saint-Joseph, Gatineau, QC K1A 0H3
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Evaluation and Selection Process
--------------------------------------

Evaluation of bids will be based on lowest price. 

### Contact Information
---------------------------

To obtain further information and bid solicitation documents, please contact:

* **Contact Name**: Shawn Davis
* **Contact Email**: shawn.davis@ec.gc.ca
* **Phone**: 873-500-0215

You can attach your questions or bid on this requisition via the Canada Buys portal. [Access the site here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)

### Attachments
--------------

Tender documents can be found in the official documents section. Please visit the attached documents to download them by clicking on the following links:

*   [5000077126-1_rfbamend](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27776/5000077126-1_rfbamend_en.pdf)
*   [5000077126 rbamend](
